title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document all requirements for the GameImageProcessor project, including input image formats (e.g., PNG, JPEG, GIF), desired transformations (e.g., resizing, cropping, watermarking), content moderation rules (e.g., nudity detection, violence detection, profanity filtering), storage options (e.g., cloud storage, CDN), integration with existing game systems (e.g., user authentication, game data management), and non-functional requirements (e.g., scalability, performance, security).

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for the GameImageProcessor, including the serverless components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Implement Image Processing Pipeline
description: Develop the serverless image processing pipeline, including components for image upload, content moderation, transformations, and storage.

title: Set up Content Moderation
description: Implement content moderation rules and integrate with third-party services or develop custom solutions for image content analysis and moderation.

title: Implement Storage and Retrieval
description: Develop the storage and retrieval mechanisms for processed images, ensuring scalability, durability, and efficient access.

title: Develop Integration Points
description: Create integration points and APIs for seamless integration with existing game systems and client applications.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Establish security measures, access controls, and authentication mechanisms to ensure the system's integrity and data privacy.

title: Set up Monitoring and Logging
description: Implement monitoring, logging, and alerting mechanisms to track the system's health, performance, and potential issues.

title: Develop Testing Strategy
description: Create a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the system's functionality and reliability.

title: Prepare Deployment and CI/CD
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, including continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD), to streamline the release process and ensure seamless updates.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including user guides, API references, and system architecture diagrams, to facilitate understanding and maintenance of the GameImageProcessor.
